question: 伯
userAnswer: count/earl | <tag>hist:</tag>chief(chief official of the Department of Worship)
activeAnswer: count/earl | <tag>hist:</tag>chief(chief official of the Department of Worship)
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>chief</kanji> of this district is that guy, the <vocabulary>count</vocabulary>. He's also the <vocabulary>earl</vocabulary> of another district, and the <vocabulary>chief</vocabulary> of yet another.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the <ja>はく</ja> reading you learned with the kanji.
